name: Celebrity: The Pop Culture Party Game of Celebrity Names
name_original: Celebrity: The Pop Culture Party Game of Celebrity Names
description:
Charades meets Heads Up in this Pop Culture Party Game!

Split into two teams, and each person comes up with a list of celebrities. Enter them into the phone and let Celebrity do the rest!

Celebrity keeps track of the time, the score, and who's turn it is. It even has sound effects to make those last few seconds even MORE tense!

Download today and see what everyone's talking about!!
